self.title: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to test name for subject characteristics that are evaluated periodically to determine if they have changed.
name: Subject Status Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The state or condition of being living or deceased; also includes the case where the vital status is unknown.
